name: Self Explosion
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for the " MiniJam 63 " by Kourosh824, yanmungul and ArashTheGD.

A man wakes up in a laboratary  with hearing some strange voices in his head and doesn't remeber anything. He then realizes that he has become a Cyborg and an AI is talking with him in his mind. He sees dead bodies all around and he realizes that the building is on self explosion mode.  Now with the help of AI he has to escape the building and find out who he was and what he was doing in the laboratory.

Have fun playing!

Please, also try to leave us some feedbacks!
